xml_full:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2025-01-28T00:00:00.000Z" agent="VisuaLearn" version="1.0" type="device">
  <diagram id="default" name="Default">
    <mxGraphModel dx="0" dy="0" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1200" pageHeight="800" math="0" shadow="0">
      <root>
        <mxCell id="0" value="" parent="" vertex="1" />
        <mxCell id="1" value="" parent="0" vertex="1" />
        <mxCell id="alice" value="Alice (Sender)" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="80" y="40" width="30" height="60" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="bob" value="Bob (Receiver)" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="650" y="40" width="30" height="60" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>

<mxCell id="keyGen" value="Key Pair Generation (Bob)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="540" y="100" width="160" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="publicKey" value="Bob's Public Key" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="380" y="180" width="120" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="privateKey" value="Bob's Private Key" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="680" y="250" width="120" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>

<mxCell id="originalMsg" value="Original Message (Plaintext)" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="40" y="180" width="160" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="encryptionProcess" value="Encryption Process" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="40" y="270" width="160" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="encryptedMsg" value="Encrypted Message (Ciphertext)" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="240" y="320" width="160" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="network" value="Network/Insecure Channel" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="300" y="380" width="180" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="decryptionProcess" value="Decryption Process" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="580" y="470" width="160" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<mxCell id="decryptedMsg" value="Decrypted Message" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;fontSize=12;" vertex="1" parent="1">
  <mxGeometry x="620" y="540" width="140" height="40" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>

<!-- Relationships -->
<!-- Bob (Receiver) → Key Pair Generation (Bob): Performs -->
<mxCell id="rel1" value="Performs" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="bob" target="keyGen">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Key Pair Generation (Bob) → Bob's Public Key: Generates -->
<mxCell id="rel2" value="Generates" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="keyGen" target="publicKey">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="620" y="150"/>
      <mxPoint x="440" y="150"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Key Pair Generation (Bob) → Bob's Private Key: Generates -->
<mxCell id="rel3" value="Generates" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.75;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="keyGen" target="privateKey">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Bob's Public Key → Alice (Sender): Is shared with (via Network/Insecure Channel) -->
<mxCell id="rel4" value="Is shared with" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;" edge="1" parent="1" source="publicKey" target="alice">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="320" y="190"/>
      <mxPoint x="320" y="70"/>
      <mxPoint x="150" y="70"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Alice (Sender) → Original Message (Plaintext): Has -->
<mxCell id="rel5" value="Has" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="alice" target="originalMsg">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="95" y="120"/>
      <mxPoint x="120" y="120"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Alice (Sender) → Encryption Process: Applies -->
<mxCell id="rel6" value="Applies" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="alice" target="encryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="95" y="240"/>
      <mxPoint x="120" y="240"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Original Message (Plaintext) → Encryption Process: Is input for -->
<mxCell id="rel7" value="Is input for" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="originalMsg" target="encryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Bob's Public Key → Encryption Process: Is used by -->
<mxCell id="rel8" value="Is used by" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="publicKey" target="encryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="440" y="230"/>
      <mxPoint x="440" y="250"/>
      <mxPoint x="160" y="250"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Encryption Process → Encrypted Message (Ciphertext): Produces -->
<mxCell id="rel9" value="Produces" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;" edge="1" parent="1" source="encryptionProcess" target="encryptedMsg">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Encrypted Message (Ciphertext) → Network/Insecure Channel: Is sent over -->
<mxCell id="rel10" value="Is sent over" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="encryptedMsg" target="network">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Network/Insecure Channel → Bob (Receiver): Delivers to -->
<mxCell id="rel11" value="Delivers to" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.75;exitY=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="network" target="bob">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="445" y="370"/>
      <mxPoint x="445" y="70"/>
      <mxPoint x="665" y="70"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Bob (Receiver) → Decryption Process: Applies -->
<mxCell id="rel12" value="Applies" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="bob" target="decryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="665" y="440"/>
      <mxPoint x="660" y="440"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Encrypted Message (Ciphertext) → Decryption Process: Is input for -->
<mxCell id="rel13" value="Is input for" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="encryptedMsg" target="decryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="320" y="370"/>
      <mxPoint x="320" y="450"/>
      <mxPoint x="620" y="450"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Bob's Private Key → Decryption Process: Is used by -->
<mxCell id="rel14" value="Is used by" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="privateKey" target="decryptionProcess">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="740" y="300"/>
      <mxPoint x="740" y="450"/>
      <mxPoint x="700" y="450"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
<!-- Decryption Process → Decrypted Message: Produces -->
<mxCell id="rel15" value="Produces" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="decryptionProcess" target="decryptedMsg">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
</mxCell>
<!-- Decrypted Message → Bob (Receiver): Is read by -->
<mxCell id="rel16" value="Is read by" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="decryptedMsg" target="bob">
  <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry">
    <Array as="points">
      <mxPoint x="690" y="530"/>
      <mxPoint x="690" y="120"/>
      <mxPoint x="675" y="120"/>
    </Array>
  </mxGeometry>
</mxCell>
      </root>
    </mxGraphModel>
  </diagram>
</mxfile>
